panels.description: Number of live nodes in the Solr cluster.
panels.title: Live nodes

panels.description: Status of ZooKeeper, integral for cluster coordination.
panels.title: Zookeeper status

panels.description: Panel to report on the status of firing alerts.
panels.title: Alerts

panels.description: Percent of running shards in the cluster.
panels.title: Running shards

panels.description: Shows the state of various shards in the cluster.
panels.title: Shard status

panels.description: Shows the total percent of running shards in the cluster.
panels.title: Running replicas

panels.description: State of replicas within a Solr collection.
panels.title: Replica status

panels.description: Top nodes by CPU load caused by the JVM.

targets.expr: topk($k, 100 * avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster) (solr_metrics_jvm_os_cpu_load{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", item="systemCpuLoad"}))

panels.title: Top nodes by CPU load

panels.description: Top nodes by the JVM heap memory usage.

targets.expr: topk($k, 100 * avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster) (sum without(item)(solr_metrics_jvm_memory_heap_bytes{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", item="used"}) / clamp_min(sum without(item)(solr_metrics_jvm_memory_heap_bytes{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", item="max"}), 1)))

panels.title: Top nodes by heap memory usage

panels.description: Top cores by the average rate of query processing in the cluster.

targets.expr: topk($k, avg by(job, base_url, solr_cluster, collection, core, searchHandler) (solr_metrics_core_query_mean_rate{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", category="QUERY", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}))

panels.title: Top cores by mean queries

panels.description: Top cores by the number of total document additions in the cluster.

targets.expr: topk($k, avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster, collection, core) (increase(solr_metrics_core_update_handler_adds_total{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}[$__interval:])))

panels.title: Top cores by update handlers / $__interval

panels.description: Top cores by the Solr index size.

targets.expr: topk($k, avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_index_size_bytes{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}))

panels.title: Top cores by index size

panels.description: Top cores by the cache hit ratio in Solr searchers.

targets.expr: bottomk($k, 100 * avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster, collection, core, type) (solr_metrics_core_searcher_cache_ratio{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", type=~"documentCache|filterCache|queryResultCache"}))

panels.title: Top cores by cache hit ratio

panels.description: Top cores by Solr core errors.

targets.expr: topk($k, avg by (job, solr_cluster, collection, core, baseurl) (increase(solr_metrics_core_errors_total{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}[$__interval:])))

panels.title: Top cores by core errors / $__interval

panels.description: Top nodes by Solr node errors.

targets.expr: topk($k, avg by (job, base_url, solr_cluster, collection) (increase(solr_metrics_node_errors_total{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster"}[$__interval:])))

panels.title: Top nodes by node errors / $__interval
